ai.summary: A short and easy 1.2 km trail in the UK designed for dogs and their humans to enjoy light agility-style challenges along a flat, dog-friendly route.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained paths with a mix of gravel, grass, and occasional compact earth. Surface is suitable for dogs and walkers; watch for roots or damp patches after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Keep dogs on a leash where required; bring water and dog waste bags; watch for other hikers and dogs; check weather conditions and wear suitable footwear; avoid extremely hot weather; supervise agility prompts and move slowly if your dog is new to agility elements.
recommended_gear: Water bottle for you and your dog
Small first aid kit for both human and dog
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; year-round visits are possible in the UK, with mild weather commonly preferred.

seo.title: Dog and Human Agility Trail – 1.2 km Easy UK Hike for Dogs and Humans
seo.meta_description: Discover a short 1.2 km easy dog-friendly trail in the UK, featuring agility-style elements for dogs and their humans. Ideal for a light outdoor outing with pets.
seo.h1: Dog and Human Agility Trail – 1.2 km Easy Hike in the UK
